Text.val: 09.03.2011 GB SCR16256 Replaced the GB002 by the GB902
31.10.2010 GB SCR15786 Cahnged calculation for the V.INTERESTNRS
-- Set V.YEARDAYS = number of days in year(PI.DATE)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (INTERESTH * (-1)) as decimal (13,2)) from (select cast (sum (LGCC_AMOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) as INTERESTH from :1/LGCC, :1/LDGR, :1/CLNT where CLNT105_INTRST_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT105_INTRST_CLNTNO = :3 and LDGR_NO = LGCC_LDGR_NO and Year (LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_DATE) = :4 and Month (LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_DATE) = :5 and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and LDGR_INCOMETYPE = 2 and LDGR_ADMNO = LGCC_LGCD_ADMNO)sq
